CustomField.description: Evaluates the referenced Bug's Priority and displays whether it meets eRelease Request criteria.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Request_Type__c , "Planned eRelease", "Priority is not part of the Planned eRelease justification criteria.", "Emergency Late Checkin", IF(ISPICKVAL(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c, "P0"), "P0: MEETS Emergency Late Checkin Criteria", IF(ISPICKVAL(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c, "P1"), "P1: MAY MEET Emergency Late Checkin criteria if issue has a Sev1 or Sev2 Investigation or Sev3 Red Account Investigation", TEXT(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c) + ": DOES NOT MEET Emergency Late Checkin criteria")), "Emergency Release", IF(ISPICKVAL(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c, "P0"), "P0: MEETS Emergency Release criteria", IF(ISPICKVAL(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c, "P1"), "P1: MAY MEET Emergency Release criteria if issue has a Sev1 or Sev2 Investigation or Sev3 Red Account Investigation", TEXT(Bug_ID__r.Priority__c) + ": DOES NOT MEET Emergency Release criteria")), "Unrecognized Request Type")
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Displays whether the referenced Bug's Priority meets the eRelease Request criteria.
CustomField.label: Does Bug Priority meet criteria?
